articles.description: Mint caught up with Shridatta Bhandwaldar, who oversees more than  ₹50,000 crore of equity assets as head-equity at Canara Robeco Mutual Fund.
articles.content: The US Federal Reserve seems to be softening its stance on interest rate hikes. Fed chair Jerome Powell said recently that interest rate hikes could slow down from December. This could have serious i… [+8737 chars]
